abstract.p: Photo-quiz about some idiosyncratic, less-well-known currencies from around world (Special section, The Sophisticated Traveler) (Part 2 of 2-part section)

block.p: Arrivederci, lira; adieu, franc; adios, peseta. After next year, these and other ill-fated currencies will lose their identities to the common Euro. But there's still enough idiosyncratic money to go around. Where can you spend the specimens shown below?
1 litas 1 new shekel 200 sum 500 kyats 5 rufiyaa 25 rupees 1 rial 50 denari
1 litas, Lithuania 1 new shekel, Israel 200 sum, Uzbekistan 500 kyats, Myanmar 5 rufiyaa, Maldives 25 rupees, Nepal 1 rial, Oman 50 denari, Macedonia
